thread.title: Zooey Deschanel's HelloGiggles has been acquired by Time Inc - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Zooey Deschanel's HelloGiggles has been acquired by Time Inc - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Zooey Deschanel's HelloGiggles has been acquired by Time Inc - Showbiz
text: Zooey Deschanel's HelloGiggles has been acquired by Time Inc.The lifestyle website, co-founded by Deschanel, Sophia Rossi and Molly McAleer, launched in 2011 and reaches 16 million people each month. © Getty Images / Steve Granitz/WireImage Business Insider claims that the deal is worth $30 million (£19 million)."With its passionate, highly-engaged audience and quality editorial voice, HelloGiggles is a great fit for our entertainment portfolio, which includes People and Entertainment Weekly," said Time Inc CEO Joe Ripp."We see the opportunity for HelloGiggles to continue to evolve and grow as a multimedia content business."The site provides strategic benefits including a contributor network that unlocks access to a new pool of editorial and creative talent, an expansive audience of highly-engaged consumers and experience in branded and native content solutions."Deschanel said: "With Time Inc as our partner, we'll be able to expand the HelloGiggles mission and inspire and support even more young women with a safe and positive media platform."
